meanings.definition: A musical instrument consisting of a graduated series of wooden bars, played by striking with mallets.
meanings.sent1: The school band played beautiful melodies on the xylophones during the concert.
meanings.sent2: She practiced diligently to master playing the xylophones in the orchestra.
meanings.sent3: The xylophones in the music room seemed to have a secret conversation when no one was around.
meanings.sent4: The xylophones echoed through the auditorium, filling the air with enchanting sounds.
meanings.sent5: The xylophones gleamed under the stage lights, captivating the audience with their music.
